Name: Wet Waifu
About the game: Welcome to Wet Waifu! This is an exciting puzzle game in which you need to draw a line so that the water fills the glass. As a reward, you will gradually discover beautiful drawings. In the game you will find 20 stunning drawings, minimalistic graphics and an exciting gameplay. Wet Waifu will help you to have a good time, relax and relieve stress. Features Of the Game Twenty drawings Beautiful graphics Relaxing music Physics-based puzzles
